mapper.select: select a.orderCode, b.id, c.dietImg, c.dietName, b.address, a.orderItemCode,d.orderItemName from orderlist a join member b join diet c join orderitem d where a.id = b.id and a.dietCode = c.dietCode and a.orderItemCode = d.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode in(5,7)
mapper.insert: insert into foodminven(inDate, price,inAmount,foodMCode, unit, outAmount,exDate,foodMName ) values (#{inDate},#{price},#{inAmount},#{foodMCode},#{unit},0,#{exDate},(select foodMName from foodmaterial where foodMCode = #{foodMCode}))
mapper.select: select a.foodMCode, a.foodMImg, a.foodMName, b.inDate, b.price, b.unit from foodmaterial a join foodminven b where a.foodMCode = b.foodMCode
mapper.update: update orderlist set transportNum = #{transportNum}, orderItemCode = 7 where orderCode = #{orderCode}
mapper.select: select a.orderCode, b.id, c.dietImg, c.dietName, b.address, a.orderItemCode,d.orderItemName, a.transportNum from orderlist a join member b join diet c join orderitem d where a.id = b.id and a.dietCode = c.dietCode and a.orderItemCode = d.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode = #{orderItemCode} order by a.orderCode desc limit #{criteria.startRecord}, #{criteria.recordsPerPage}

select count(a.orderCode) from orderlist a join member b join diet c join orderitem d where a.id = b.id and a.dietCode = c.dietCode and a.orderItemCode = d.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode = #{orderItemCode}
